DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize control trial evaluate effect route administration 10 IU oxytocin average blood loss postpartum . Participants randomize receive 10 IU oxytocin IV infusion 10 IU oxytocin injection IM
DOC.brief_title: IV Versus IM Administration Oxytocin Postpartum Bleeding
DOC.criteria: She present give birth live fetus Vaginal delivery Willing participate study Able give inform consent Scheduled cesarean Reject placement IV labor ( intravenous infusion ) Can give informed consent reason Not willing / answer question background
